reviews.text:
Best pizza around ,chicken wings pretty good too.
Food always arrives fast and hot I'd highly recommend as our experiences here have always been good.Packaged very well too meaning food travels wellâœ…

Food tastes fantastic,  garlic Parma chicken things are so good.
Milkshakes are realy good, not to thick or runny and the flavours don't taste artificial.

Pizzas are well made and cooked, along with the garlic bread. Had most of the menu now and can't fault it at all. Staff are helpful and friendly.
Not a bad word to say about the place.
Great value for money.
Friendly staff.. Amazing food for affordable prices. Loved it
Banana milkshake was so good I might've gone to heaven for about 3 minutes.
Excellent range, fast and good price, very welcoming

A long time since we visited due to Covid but went today and it was simply superb. Had our usual but tried a new sushi dish with prawns, all fried in a batter. Sublime. The staff are amazing and when we arrived, although it was full downstairs, a young lady and her friend moved upstairs so we could be seated. Made our day.

Amazing sushi platter, beautifully presented and everything was perfect in texture and flavour. The chicken gyozas were very delicious, some of the best I've had. Definitely a good find and we would return.
Best Japanese restaurant in Norwich. Genuinely my favourite place to eat. The only down side is it's makes me wish I was back in Japan!
Lovely atmosphere. Great authentic food. Wonderful staff. But small place so always worth booking to avoid disappointment.
Although we had to wait for an hour for our food (table for 2), I still give it 5 stars. The staff was lovely, the food was delicious and the price was fair for the quality. 10/10 recommend!
Pure magic. In the best way possible! Eclectic decor. Bespoke drinks. Entertaining engaging staff. I love it!

Absolutely love this place! Staff are always so friendly and attentive, they really make you feel right at home!

We ordered cocktail takeaway for New Year and the cocktails were amazing - well packaged, good strength to them!

Cannot recommend this enough!
What a great quirky place to relax and have a cocktail. If anyone has played resident evil 7 then similar decor but no gore!  Great staff and drinks very good.
Amazing place. Servis was over the top and the drinks was sooooo good,
Impossible to describe, just visit and enjoy the quirkiest little bar in Norwich! Also say hi to the doggos for me.
